attributes.title: A Christmas Horde Mode Special
attributes.description: Dungeon Master Frank takes Gus, Geoff, Griffon, Ryan, and Michael back to the ship for a special Horde Mode round of battles.

attributes.title: Post Show #20
attributes.caption: The gang takes a look back at season 1. Plus a special viewer submitted song recapping episodes 1-19.
attributes.description: The gang takes a look back at season 1. Plus a special viewer submitted song recapping episodes 1-19.

attributes.title: Post Show #19
attributes.caption: Geoff has a sandwich (making us all hungry). Griffon, Frank, and Ryan discuss the choice to split up and, look at some cool fan art.
attributes.description: Geoff has a sandwich (making us all hungry). Griffon, Frank, and Ryan discuss the choice to split up and, look at some cool fan art.

attributes.title: Post Show #18
attributes.caption: A look at some deleted scenes. Geoff gives the crew a hard time (again) syncing the cameras.  Plus fan art with a theme song.
attributes.description: A look at some deleted scenes. Geoff gives the crew a hard time (again) syncing the cameras.  Plus fan art with a theme song.

attributes.title: Post Show #17
attributes.caption: Geoff, Michael, Griffon and Frank answer important questions like, “What they are drinking?”. And look at some deleted scenes.
attributes.description: Geoff, Michael, Griffon and Frank answer important questions like, "What they are drinking?". And look at some deleted scenes.

attributes.title: Post Show #16
attributes.caption: Geoff, Michael, and Frank talk about metagaming while looking at new fan art.
attributes.description: Geoff, Michael, and Frank talk about metagaming while looking at new fan art.

attributes.title: Post Show #15
attributes.caption: Gus, Griffion and Frank talk about using cards as an alternative to rolling dice. They also take a look at some great fan art.
attributes.description: Gus, Griffion and Frank talk about using cards as an alternative to rolling dice. They also take a look at some great fan art.

attributes.title: Post Show #14
attributes.caption: Deleted moments from in between episode 13 game board setups.
attributes.description: Deleted moments from in between episode 13 game board setups.

attributes.title: Post Show #13
attributes.caption: Geoff and Griffon introduce Allison and ask her about experience playing Orma.
attributes.description: Geoff and Griffon introduce Allison and ask her about experience playing Orma.

attributes.title: Post Show #12
attributes.caption: Frank, Michael, Geoff and Ryan talk about the first boss fight.
attributes.description: Frank, Michael, Geoff and Ryan talk about the first boss fight.

attributes.title: Post Show #11
attributes.caption: Frank, Gus, and Griffon talk about Fan Art and call for more submissions.
attributes.description: Frank, Gus, and Griffon talk about Fan Art and call for more submissions.

attributes.title: Post Show #10
attributes.caption: Frank, Geoff, and Griffon talk about the creation of Heroes and Halfwits. Plus, how all the game pieces came to be.
attributes.description: Frank, Geoff, and Griffon talk about the creation of Heroes and Halfwits. Plus, how all the game pieces came to be.

attributes.title: Episode One
attributes.caption: Dare ye cross over into a realm of mystery and intrigue? Methinks ye shall. Join Geoff, Gus, Ryan, Michael, and Dungeon Master Frank for the first episode of the official Heroes & Halfwits adventure.
attributes.description: Dare ye cross over into a realm of mystery and intrigue? Methinks ye shall. Join Geoff, Griffon, Gus, Ryan, Michael, and Dungeon Master Frank for the first episode of the official Heroes & Halfwits adventure.

attributes.title: Episode Two
attributes.caption: Geoff, Griffon, Jack, Gus, Ryan, Michael, and Dungeon Master Frank continue their journey into the mystical world of Dungeons & Dragons in this second installment of Heroes & Halfwits.
attributes.description: Geoff, Griffon, Jack, Gus, Ryan, Michael, and Dungeon Master Frank continue their journey into the mystical world of Dungeons & Dragons in this second installment of Heroes & Halfwits.

attributes.title: Episode Three
attributes.caption: Dungeon Master Frank leads our heroes Geoff, Griffon, Jack, Gus, Ryan and Michael onward in the next chapter of Heroes & Halfwits. Huzzah!
attributes.description: Dungeon Master Frank leads our heroes Geoff, Griffon, Jack, Gus, Ryan and Michael onward in the next chapter of Heroes & Halfwits. Huzzah!

attributes.title: Episode Four
attributes.caption: Dungeon Master Frank leads our heroes Geoff, Griffon, Jack, Gus, Ryan and Michael onward in the fourth chapter of Heroes & Halfwits. Huzzah!
attributes.description: Dungeon Master Frank leads our heroes Geoff, Griffon, Jack, Gus, Ryan and Michael onward in the fourth chapter of Heroes & Halfwits. Huzzah!

attributes.title: Episode Five
attributes.caption: The mystical mayhem and magic continues in this week's Heroes & Halfwits! Join our heroes Geoff, Griffon, Ryan, Michael and Dungeon Master Frank as they journey onwards.
attributes.description: The mystical mayhem and magic continues in this week's Heroes & Halfwits! Join our heroes Geoff, Griffon, Ryan, Michael and Dungeon Master Frank as they journey onwards.

attributes.title: Episode Six
attributes.caption: Heroes & Halfwits! Join our heroes Gus, Geoff, Griffon, Ryan, Michael and Dungeon Master Frank as they journey into the dark damp mouth of the cave.
attributes.description: Heroes & Halfwits! Join our heroes Gus, Geoff, Griffon, Ryan, Michael and Dungeon Master Frank as they journey into the dark damp mouth of the cave.

attributes.title: Episode Seven
attributes.caption: Heroes & Halfwits! “Do they speak Deep?” Heroes Gus, Geoff, Griffon, Ryan, Michael and Dungeon Master Frank try and find a way out of the cave after rescuing some new friends along the way.
attributes.description: Heroes & Halfwits! "Do they speak Deep?" Heroes Gus, Geoff, Griffon, Ryan, Michael and Dungeon Master Frank try and find a way out of the cave after rescuing some new friends along the way.

attributes.title: Episode Eight
attributes.caption: It’s a battle against the gooey cube. Follow our Heroes and Halfwits Gus, Geoff, Griffon, Ryan, Michael and Dungeon Master Frank in and out of hidden rooms in the cave.
attributes.description: It's a battle against the gooey cube. Follow our Heroes and Halfwits Gus, Geoff, Griffon, Ryan, Michael and Dungeon Master Frank in and out of hidden rooms in the cave.

attributes.title: Episode Nine
attributes.caption: Just how dark can a cave get? Our heroes are about to find out! Follow our Heroes and Halfwits Gus, Geoff, Griffon, Ryan, Michael and Dungeon Master Frank “Peace gentle bird people”
attributes.description: Just how dark can a cave get? Our heroes are about to find out! Follow our Heroes and Halfwits Gus, Geoff, Griffon, Ryan, Michael and Dungeon Master Frank "Peace gentle bird people"

attributes.title: Episode Ten
attributes.caption: ​Is it all just an illusion? Follow our Heroes and Halfwits Gus, Geoff, Griffon, Ryan, Michael, Jeremy and Dungeon Master Frank as they take on the Drow with new spells…and outfits.
attributes.description: Is it all just an illusion? Follow our Heroes and Halfwits Gus, Geoff, Griffon, Ryan, Michael, Jeremy and Dungeon Master Frank as they take on the Drow with new spells___„Х_____„Х_Д_ќ__„Х_____and outfits.

attributes.title: Episode 11
attributes.caption: ​Heroes and Halfwits Gus, Geoff, Griffon, Ryan, Michael, Jeremy and Dungeon Master Frank listen to songs, drink poison, and some how come together to battle a new creature.
attributes.description: Heroes and Halfwits Gus, Geoff, Griffon, Ryan, Michael, Jeremy and Dungeon Master Frank listen to songs, drink poison, and some how come together to battle a new creature.

attributes.title: Episode 12
attributes.caption: ​Heroes and Halfwits Gus, Geoff, Griffon, Ryan, Michael, and Dungeon Master Frank decide that looking cool and working together will defeat the cave dwellers. If they can stay alive.
attributes.description: Heroes and Halfwits Gus, Geoff, Griffon, Ryan, Michael, and Dungeon Master Frank decide that looking cool and working together will defeat the cave dwellers. If they can stay alive.

attributes.title: Episode 13
attributes.caption: Let’s go Shopping! Heroes and Halfwits Gus, Geoff, Griffon, Allison, Ryan, Michael, and Dungeon Master Frank find a merchant in the cave after a scrapping with few more monsters.
attributes.description: Let's go Shopping! Heroes and Halfwits Gus, Geoff, Griffon, Allison, Ryan, Michael, and Dungeon Master Frank find a merchant in the cave after a scrapping with few more monsters.

attributes.title: Episode 14
attributes.caption: There are Ghosts? Heroes and Halfwits Gus, Geoff, Griffon, Allison, Ryan, Michael, and Dungeon Master Frank get a little wet fighting to get out of the cave.
attributes.description: There are Ghosts? Heroes and Halfwits Gus, Geoff, Griffon, Allison, Ryan, Michael, and Dungeon Master Frank get a little wet fighting to get out of the cave.

attributes.title: Episode 15
attributes.caption: ​ Are we tripping? Heroes and Halfwits Gus, Geoff, Griffon, Allison, Ryan, Michael, and Dungeon Master Frank are on the path to exit the cave and encounter some Fungus.
attributes.description: Are we tripping? Heroes and Halfwits Gus, Geoff, Griffon, Allison, Ryan, Michael, and Dungeon Master Frank are on the path to exit the cave and encounter some Fungus.

attributes.title: Episode 16
attributes.caption: ​ “There is something off about this girl” Join Heroes and Halfwits Gus, Geoff, Griffon, Ryan, Michael, and Dungeon Master Frank as things get greasy, followers turn and a new path is discovered.
attributes.description: "There is something off about this girl" Join Heroes and Halfwits Gus, Geoff, Griffon, Ryan, Michael, and Dungeon Master Frank as things get greasy, followers turn and a new path is discovered.

attributes.title: Episode 17
attributes.caption: “Love is a spell” Join Heroes and Halfwits Gus, Geoff, Griffon, Ryan, Michael, and Dungeon Master Frank navigate the canal to a sewage treatment station that is not exactly abandoned.
attributes.description: "Love is a spell" Join Heroes and Halfwits Gus, Geoff, Griffon, Ryan, Michael, and Dungeon Master Frank navigate the canal to a sewage treatment station that is not exactly abandoned.

attributes.title: Episode 18
attributes.caption: Heroes and Halfwits Gus, Geoff, Griffon, Miles, Ryan, Michael, and Dungeon Master Frank are out of the cave, out of the sewers, and into the slums of Jackal Heart.
attributes.description: Heroes and Halfwits Gus, Geoff, Griffon, Miles, Ryan, Michael, and Dungeon Master Frank are out of the cave, out of the sewers, and into the slums of Jackal Heart.

attributes.title: Episode 19
attributes.caption: Heroes and Halfwits Gus, Geoff, Griffon, Miles, Ryan, Michael, and Dungeon Master Frank are in the city of Jackal Heart. Avoiding getting involved in gang activity, the team has split up to shop for new digs to blend in.
attributes.description: Heroes and Halfwits Gus, Geoff, Griffon, Miles, Ryan, Michael, and Dungeon Master Frank are in the city of Jackal Heart. Avoiding getting involved in gang activity, the team has split up to shop for new digs to blend in. What could go wrong? Everything of course!

attributes.title: Episode 20
attributes.caption: “Spy Master” Heroes and Halfwits Gus, Geoff, Griffon, Ryan, Michael, and Dungeon Master Frank are in the city of Jackal Heart. After breaking off in two teams to find clothes, one team enters the casino. Will the others join them in time?
attributes.description: "Spy Master" Heroes and Halfwits Gus, Geoff, Griffon, Ryan, Michael, and Dungeon Master Frank are in the city of Jackal Heart. After breaking off in two teams to find clothes, one team enters the casino. Will the others join them in time?
